Standard Cache Import Test

HomeResults

Testing Standard Import

import { revalidatePath } from 'next/cache'

This test uses the standard Next.js cache import directly. This is the default approach but results in larger bundle sizes:

  • Official Next.js API
  • Imports the entire Next.js cache infrastructure
  • Larger bundle size (~13.5KB)

How it works

The standard import brings in the full Next.js cache implementation. While convenient, this increases your application's bundle size significantly.

Quick Facts

Method:Standard
Bundle Size:13.5KB
Import:next/cache
